## EthersBeraBorrowConnection interface

Information about a connection to the BeraBorrow protocol.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface EthersBeraBorrowConnection extends EthersBeraBorrowConnectionOptionalParams 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [EthersBeraBorrowConnectionOptionalParams](./lib-ethers.ethersberaborrowconnectionoptionalparams.md)

## Remarks

Provided for debugging / informational purposes.

Exposed through [ReadableEthersBeraBorrow.connection](./lib-ethers.readableethersberaborrow.connection.md) and [EthersBeraBorrow.connection](./lib-ethers.ethersberaborrow.connection.md)<!-- -->.

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [addresses](./lib-ethers.ethersberaborrowconnection.addresses.md) | Record&lt;string, string&gt; | A mapping of BeraBorrow contracts' names to their addresses. |
|  [bootstrapPeriod](./lib-ethers.ethersberaborrowconnection.bootstrapperiod.md) | number | Time period (in seconds) after <code>deploymentDate</code> during which redemptions are disabled. |
|  [chainId](./lib-ethers.ethersberaborrowconnection.chainid.md) | number | Chain ID of the connected network. |
|  [deploymentDate](./lib-ethers.ethersberaborrowconnection.deploymentdate.md) | Date | Date when the BeraBorrow contracts were deployed. |
|  [liquidityMiningPOLLENRewardRate](./lib-ethers.ethersberaborrowconnection.liquidityminingpollenrewardrate.md) | [Decimal](./lib-base.decimal.md) | Amount of POLLEN collectively rewarded to stakers of the liquidity mining pool per second. |
|  [provider](./lib-ethers.ethersberaborrowconnection.provider.md) | [EthersProvider](./lib-ethers.ethersprovider.md) | Ethers <code>Provider</code> used for connecting to the network. |
|  [signer?](./lib-ethers.ethersberaborrowconnection.signer.md) | [EthersSigner](./lib-ethers.etherssigner.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> Ethers <code>Signer</code> used for sending transactions. |
|  [startBlock](./lib-ethers.ethersberaborrowconnection.startblock.md) | number | Number of block in which the first BeraBorrow contract was deployed. |
|  [totalStabilityPoolPOLLENReward](./lib-ethers.ethersberaborrowconnection.totalstabilitypoolpollenreward.md) | [Decimal](./lib-base.decimal.md) | Total amount of POLLEN allocated for rewarding stability depositors. |
|  [version](./lib-ethers.ethersberaborrowconnection.version.md) | string | Version of the BeraBorrow contracts (Git commit hash). |
